title: Authors and Citation
text: Hadley Wickham. Author, maintainer. Robby Shaver. Author. Desirée De Leon. Author. . Copyright holder, funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wickham H, Shaver R, De Leon D (2025). tidytemplate: 'pkgdown' Templates Core 'Tidyverse' Packages. R package version 1.0.0, https://tidytemplate.tidyverse.org, https://github.com/tidyverse/tidytemplate.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tidytemplate: 'pkgdown' Templates for Core 'Tidyverse' Packages},   author = {Hadley Wickham and Robby Shaver and Desirée {De Leon}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.0.0,     https://tidytemplate.tidyverse.org},   url = {https://github.com/tidyverse/tidytemplate}, }

title: pkgdown Templates for Core Tidyverse Packages
text: tidytemplate provides custom pkgdown template tidyverse, r-lib, tidymodels, rmarkdown packages. Please don’t use package.

title: pkgdown Templates for Core Tidyverse Packages
text: sites, ensure DESCRIPTION contains:

title: pkgdown Templates for Core Tidyverse Packages
text: Ping Hadley slack get site added plausible.
code: template:   package: tidytemplate   bootstrap: 5      includes:     in_header: |       <script defer data-domain="{YOUR DOMAIN},all.tidyverse.org" src="https://plausible.io/js/plausible.js"></script>          development:   mode: auto

title: pkgdown Templates for Core Tidyverse Packages
text: Ping Hadley slack get site added plausible.
code: template:   package: tidytemplate   bootstrap: 5   bslib:     primary: "#CA225E"    includes:       in_header: |         <script defer data-domain="{YOUR DOMAIN},all.tidymodels.org" src="https://plausible.io/js/plausible.js"></script>    development:   mode: auto

title: pkgdown Templates for Core Tidyverse Packages
code: template:   package: tidytemplate   bootstrap: 5      bslib:     primary: "#096B72"     navbar-background: "#e6f3fc"   trailing_slash_redirect: true

title: pkgdown Templates for Core Tidyverse Packages
text: ’re updating previous pkgdown config, use following checklist make sure everything date:
code: * [ ] `usethis::use_pkgdown_github_pages()` * [ ] Ensure Author includes RStudio as copyright holder and funder * [ ] Update `DESCRIPTION` to include `Config/Needs/website: tidyverse/tidytemplate` * [ ] Update `_pkgdown.yml` with appropriate template above. * [ ] Ping Hadley to add plausible.io record * [ ] Remove `strip_header: true` * [ ] Remove algolia search, if used * [ ] Eliminate superseded navbar customisation (`home: ~`, article re-ordering) * [ ] Update `news` structure if needed * [ ] Remove any author info for tidyverse folks (since now included in template)
